events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but I want to return it because it doesn’t fit me and I would like my money back.
Customer request related to product return and refund has been identified and categorized accordingly.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent John to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you process your return and refund for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is still in the original packaging and has not been worn at all.
Great! I have initiated your return process, and once we receive the jacket back, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to receiving my refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case is now closed. Please reach out anytime if you have further needs.
